attributes.action: Allow our adult learning group (ECDL) at South Wye, Hereford, to keep the same tutor for Part 2 of our course.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are halfway through our ECDL Part 1 course at South Wye Learning Centre. Part 2 is next year, but the powers that be want to change our tutor.
Please help us by signing our petition.
Thank you.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
